Internet explorer does not currently support VR videos. If you would like to try the experience, we would recommend using Google Chrome or Firefox.

Get Google Chrome Get Firefox

In 39 years, the Colorado Lottery has given $3.9 billion dollars back to various parks, trials, and open spaces across the state. Gear up, head out and experience some of the most thrilling proceed destinations in 360 VR right where you're at. Want to just have a fun time? Play the Proceeds minigame.
